Description: Ratio of Width to the height of the visual when bubbles are combined.
Detail: Use to adjust the hieght of the visual corresponsing to a given width of the visual container.  Height of the visual will decrease with increase in aspect ratio.

Description: Ratio of Width to the height of the visual when bubbles are split by segment.
Detail: Use to adjust the hieght of the visual corresponsing to a given width of the visual container.  Height of the visual will decrease with increase in aspect ratio.

Description: Margin in pixels from the top of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing top of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the right of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing right of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the bottom of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing bottom of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the left of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing left of the visual.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Color scheme of the bubbles along the x-axis.
Detail: Chose colors of the bars by providing an array of valid colors values. First value corresponds to left bar color. Second value corresponds to right bar.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Array of valid color values or d3 color scheme.  Example: ['red', '#333'] or d3.schemeCategory10

Description: Color scheme of the bubbles along the x-axis.
Detail: Chose one of the provided color schemes.
Valid Values: One of schemeBrBG, schemePRGn', schemePiYG', schemePuOr', schemeRdBu', schemeRdGy', schemeRdYlBu', schemeRdYlGn', schemeSpectral', schemeBuGn', schemeBuPu', schemeGnBu', schemeOrRd', schemePuBuGn', schemePuBu', schemePuRd', schemeRdPu', schemeYlGnBu', schemeYlGn', schemeYlOrBr', schemeYlOrRd',  schemeBlues', schemeGreens', schemeGreys', schemePurples', schemeReds', schemeOranges'

Description: Number of colors to be used from the provided scheme.
Detail: Chose number  of colors for the bubbles.

Description: Distance between the bubbles in steady state
Detail: Adjust the value to change the density of bubbles.

Description: Minimum and maximum values of the x-axis
Detail: Provide and array of 2 numbers. First for minimum size and secod for maximum value.

Description: X-axis label
Detail: Defaults to xField column name

Description: Prefix for x-axis values
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Formatter for x-axis value.
Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Suffix for x-axis values
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Minimum and maximum size of the circles in pixels.
Detail: Provide and array of 2 numbers. First for minimum size and secod for maximum size of the circle. Defaults to [2, 20]

Description: Prefix for size value
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Formatter for size value.
Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Suffix for size value
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Value of size for size legend circles
Detail: Provide array of numbers corresponding to the size values to be shown in size legend.

Description: Title of size legend
Detail: Defaults to sizeField column name

Description: Gap in pixels between size legend circles
Detail: Change the value to adjust th gap between size legend circles

Description: Title of color legend
Detail: Defaults to xField column name

Description: Label of segment header when combined
Detail: Defaults to 'All'

Description: Label of segment header when split
Detail: Defaults to segment field column name

Description: Label of segment tilte when bubble are combined
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Label of segment tilte when bubble are split
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: CSS classes for styling the split button
Detail: Provide css classes to style the split button as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: CSS classes for styling the combined button
Detail: Provide css classes to style the combined button as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: CSS classes for styling the search bar
Detail: Provide css classes to style the search bar as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: Ratio of Width to the height of the visual.
Detail: Use to adjust the hieght of the visual corresponsing to a given width of the visual container.  Height of the visual will decrease with increase in aspect ratio.

Description: Margin in pixels from the top of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing top of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the right of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing right of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the bottom of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing bottom of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the left of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing left of the visual.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Colors of the stacked bars.
Detail: Chose colors of the stacked bars by providing an array of valid colors values.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Array of valid color values or d3 color scheme. Minimum number of colors in the array should be euqal to number of stacked fields. Example: ['red', '#333'] or d3.schemeCategory10

Description: Order of the years to be displayed
Detail: Set true for descending and false for ascending

Description: Format to parse inputed unique time field
Detail: Provide a time parser string corresponding to the input unique time field. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-time-format

Description: Format to format inputed unique time field
Detail: Provide a time formatter string correponding to the input unique time field. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-time-format

Description: Gap between groups along the row.
Detail: Adjust the gap between the groups in a row by varying the number between 0 and 1.

Description: Height of the stacks in groups.
Detail: Adjust the height of the stack by varying the number between 0 and 1.

Description: Width of the legend.
Detail: Chose legend width

Description: Height of the legend.
Detail: Chose legend height

Description: Margin in pixels from the top of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing top of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the right of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing right of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the bottom of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing bottom of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the left of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing left of the visual.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Prefix for value
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Suffix for value
Detail: Defaults to empty string

Description: Formatter for value.
Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Directional or non-directional chord type.
Detail: Chose between directional or non-directional chord.

Description: Colors of the chords.
Detail: Chose colors of the chords by providing an array of valid colors values.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Array of valid color values or d3 color scheme. Minimum number of colors in the array should be euqal to number of source or target fields. Example: ['red', '#333'] or d3.schemeCategory10

Description: Font size of arc labels
Detail: Chose font size in pixels of arc labels.

Description: Opacity of chords when active
Detail: Provide opacity to be applied on chords when in active state

Description: Opactiy of chords when inactive
Detail: Provide opacity to be applied on chords when in inactive state

Description: CSS classes for styling the search bar
Detail: Provide css classes to style the search bar as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: CSS classes for styling the clear all button
Detail: Provide css classes to style the clear all button as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: CSS classes for styling the show all button
Detail: Provide css classes to style the show all button as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: Starting state of chords. All active or all inactive
Detail: Chose the starting state of the chords. Either all active or all inactive.

Description: Margin in pixels from the top of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing top of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the right of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing right of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the bottom of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing bottom of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the left of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing left of the visual.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Formatter for value.
Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Continuous color range of the states/counties.
Detail: Chose continuous color range for the states/counties by providing an array of valid color scheme.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Valid d3 color interpolation scheme.  Example: d3.interpolateBlues

Description: Title of color legend
Detail: Defaults to valueField

Description: Color of states/counties when value is null
Detail: Chose color of state/coutny when the value is null. Defaults to gray.

Description: Message in tooltip for states/counties when value is null
Detail: Chose message in the tooltip for state/coutny when the value is null. Defaults to "Data not available".

Description: Color of states/counties when state/coutny is missing
Detail: Chose color of state/coutny when the state/county is missing. Defaults to gray.

Description: Message in tooltip for states/counties when value is missing
Detail: Chose message in the tooltip for state/coutny when the state/county is missing. Defaults to "Data missing".

Description: CSS classes for styling the search bar
Detail: Provide css classes to style the search bar as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: Opacity of counties when not matched with search
Detail: Provide opacity to be applied to counties when in inactive state

Description: Margin in pixels from the top of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing top of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the right of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing right of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the bottom of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing bottom of the visual.

Detail: Use to adjust the spacing left of the visual.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Formatter for value.
Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Continuous color range of the states/counties.
Detail: Chose continuous color range for the states/counties by providing an array of valid color scheme.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Valid d3 color interpolation scheme.  Example: d3.interpolateBlues

Description: Title of color legend
Detail: Defaults to valueField

Description: Color of states/counties when value is null
Detail: Chose color of state/coutny when the value is null. Defaults to gray.

Description: Message in tooltip for states/counties when value is null
Detail: Chose message in the tooltip for state/coutny when the value is null. Defaults to "Data not available".

Description: Color of states/counties when state/coutny is missing
Detail: Chose color of state/coutny when the state/county is missing. Defaults to gray.

Description: Message in tooltip for states/counties when value is missing
Detail: Chose message in the tooltip for state/coutny when the state/county is missing. Defaults to "Data missing".

Description: CSS classes for styling the search bar
Detail: Provide css classes to style the search bar as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: Custom colors for the states.
Detail: Chose colors of the states by providing an array of valid colors values. Use when interpolation is not required.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Array of valid color values or d3 color scheme. Minimum number of colors in the array should be euqal to number of source or target fields. Example: ['red', '#333'] or d3.schemeCategory10

Description: Chose to enable or disable search
Detail: Enable or disable the search bar per your requirement. Handy when linking choropleth to other charts.

Description: Ratio of Width to the height of the visual.
Detail: Use to adjust the hieght of the visual corresponsing to a given width of the visual container.  Height of the visual will decrease with increase in aspect ratio.

Description: Margin in pixels from the top of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing top of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the right of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing right of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the bottom of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing bottom of the visual.

Description: Margin in pixels from the left of the chart area.
Detail: Use to adjust the spacing left of the visual.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Colors of the two bars.
Detail: Chose colors of the bars by providing an array of valid colors values. First value corresponds to left bar color. Second value corresponds to right bar.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Array of valid color values or d3 color scheme.  Example: ['red', '#333'] or d3.schemeCategory10

Description: Starting value for the left and right bars. This is also the midpoint of the chart's x-axis.
Detail: Chose the starting value of both the bars. If provided value is greater than the smallest value in the dataset for either bar then the starting value will default to the smallest value in the dataset.

Description: Size of the tick on the x-axis.
Detail: Adjust the tick size on the x-axis.

Description: Label of the left x-axis.
Detail: Change the label of the left x-axis. Defaults to series name of the left bar provided in the dimensions.

Description: Label of the left x-axis.
Detail: Change the label of the right x-axis. Defaults to series name of the right bar provided in the dimensions.

Description: Label of the x-axis.
Detail: Provide x-axis label. No label will be displayed if no value is provided.

Description: Bars to be shown active in starting state.
Detail: Provide an array of bar names to be shown active in starting state. Provide 'All' if you want to keep all bars active.
Valid Values: Array of bar names or All. Example: ['Raligion', 'Income'] or 'All' or []

Description: Opacity of bars when active
Detail: Provide opacity to be applied on bars when in active state

Description: Opactiy of bars when inactive
Detail: Provide opacity to be applied on bars when in inactive state

Detail: Provide css classes to style the initial state button as intended. Provided css classes should be available in included css style sheet.

Description: Background color of the chart area.
Detail: Change background color of the chart area.

Description: Horizontal spacing to the left of first and right of last domino
Detail: Adjust the spacing to the left and right of the first and last domino by chosing a value between 0 and 1.

Description: Label for x-axis
Detail: Provide a label for the x-axis. Defaults to xField name.

Description: Size of the domino
Detail: Adjust size of domino by chosing a number between 0 and 1

Description: Vertical spacing between domino rows
Detail: Adjust the vertical spacing between domino rows by chosing a value between 0 and 1.

Description: Vertical spacing abvoe top and below bottom domino row
Detail: Adjust the spacing to above and below the first and last domino row by chosing a value between 0 and 1.

Description: Sort order of y-axis.
Detail: Chose sort order of y-axis. Defaults to descending.

Description: Strategy to highlighted dominos.
Detail: Chose to highlight dominos by value or rank.  By value: dominos above a certain threshold will be highlighted. By rank:  dominos below a certain threshold will be highlighted.

Description: Threshold value for color strategy
Detail: Provide the threshold value to be used for coloring/highlighting strategy

Description: Color of domino when highlighted
Detail: Chose color of highlighted domino.

Description: Color of domino when normal
Detail: Chose color of normal domino.

Description: Legend label for normal domino
Detail: Provide label for normal domino

Detail: Provide label for highlighted domino

Detail: Provide array of numbers corresponding to the size values to be shown in size legend.

Description: Gap between size legend dominos
Detail: Adjust the spacing within the size legend area

Description: Gap between size legend label and size legend dominos
Detail: Adjust the spacing within the size legend area

Description: Minimum and maximum values of the x-axis
Detail: Provide and array of 2 numbers. First for minimum value and second for maximum value.

Description: Label for x-axis
Detail: Provide a label for the x-axis. Defaults to xField name.

Description: X-axis label offset from axis
Detail: Adjust the position of x-axis labels from the axis/axis tick values.

Description: Formatter for x-axis value.
Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Format to parse inputed date field on yaxis
Detail: Provide a time parser string corresponding to the input unique time field. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-time-format

Detail: Provide a time formatter string correponding to the input unique time field. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-time-format

Detail: Provide a formatter string. Format of the formatter string are here: https://github.com/d3/d3-format

Description: Custom domain to determine color of dominos
Detail: Provide and array of 2 numbers.

Description: Colors of dominos
Detail: Chose colors of the dominos by providing an array of valid colors values.  One of the d3 color scheme can also be provided. (https://github.com/d3/d3-scale-chromatic)
Valid Values: Array of valid color values or d3 color scheme. Minimum number of colors in the array should be euqal to number of stacked fields. Example: ['red', '#333'] or d3.schemeCategory10

Description: Title of color legend
Detail: Provide label for colro legend. Default to xField name.

Description: Minimum and maximum size of the dominos in pixels.
Detail: Provide and array of 2 numbers. First for minimum size and secod for maximum size of the circle. Defaults to [2, 20]

Description: Scale type for size dimension
Detail: Chose liner or loag scale for the size of dominos

Description: Base of log scale
Detail: Base of log scale. Defautls to 10. Applicable only if sizeScaleType is log

Description: Height of the domino
Detail: Adjust height of domino by chosing a number between 0 and 1

Description: Vertical spacing abvoe top and below bottom domino row
Detail: Adjust the spacing to above and below the first and last domino row by chosing a value between 0 and 1.

Detail: Provide an array of domino names to be shown active in starting state. Provide 'All' if you want to keep all bars active.
Valid Values: Array of bar names or All. Example: ['Raligion', 'Income'] or 'All' or []

Detail: Provide opacity to be applied on bars when in active state

Description: Opactiy of bars when inactive
Detail: Provide opacity to be applied on bars when in inactive state
